result.name: holderness-inshore-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey of Holderness Inshore rMCZ site has been completed to date (March 
2012):

Cruise: EA_hgdn0312

Date: 12th March 2012 - 21st March 2012

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): None acquired to date

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): None acquired to date

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 5 video transects; no stills analysed 
(EA_hgdn0312) - Usable

PSA Samples to date: None acquired to date

Infauna Samples to date: 3
